titles.title: To amend the Communications Act of 1934 to add an additional purpose to section 1 of such Act.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.

bill.summary: 9/21/2012--Introduced. Expands the purposes of the Communications Act of 1934 to include a requirement that the Federal Communications Commission (FCC) execute and enforce such Act to make communications networks more secure, resilient, and defendable against Internet-based attacks.
